channel.title: CVE Feed for Igor Funa -- Ad Inserter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Igor Funa -- Ad Inserter

item.title: CVE-2024-49248|2024-10-17T19:35:31.749Z -- igor%20funa -- ad%20inserter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Igor Funa Ad Inserter allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Ad Inserter: from n/a through 2.7.37.
